'''Haleth''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
* '''[[Haleth|Lady Haleth]] ({{FA|341}} - {{FA|420|n}}), a matriarch of [[Men]] and head of the Haladin.'''
** The [[House of Haleth]], originally the ''Haladin'', the [[Edain#The Three Houses|Second House of the Edain]] renamed in Haleth's honour.
* [[Haleth (son of Helm)|Haleth]] (died circa {{TA|2759}}), son of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] of [[Rohan]].
==Adaptations==
* [[Haleth (film character)|Haleth]], the son of [[Háma]] in the [[2002]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.
